updates.title: CMS System Launched
updates.content: Our new GitHub-compatible CMS is now live! You can now manage all club content including slider images, team photos, and announcements directly through GitHub. No technical knowledge required - just upload your files and the system handles the rest.

updates.title: New Team Members Joined
updates.content: We welcome new members to our leadership team. Check out the updated team photos in the CMS. New members bring fresh perspectives and energy to our environmental initiatives.

updates.title: Slider Images Updated
updates.content: Fresh slider images have been added to showcase our latest environmental projects and community engagement activities. These images represent our commitment to sustainable education and green initiatives.

updates.title: GitHub Pages Integration Complete
updates.content: Our website is now fully integrated with GitHub Pages, ensuring reliable hosting and easy content management. All updates are automatically reflected across the site within minutes of uploading new content.
